name: Hyper Universe - Underdogs Starter Pack
detailed_description:
These Hypers might not get the love that they so justly deserve, but their high win rates speak for themselves. Download the Underdogs Starter Pack to unleash four of our most underappreciated characters. This DLC gives you access to Curse Eye, Tooth and Tops, Gelimer, and Signal, as well as all of their own unique equipment. You’ll also receive Tier 1 recolor skins for every Hyper in this pack.

This pack contains the following:

Hypers
  • Curse Eye
  • Tooth and Tops
  • Gelimer
  • Signal

Skins
  • Curse Eye “Mutant” Recolor Skin
  • Tooth and Tops “Wild Charger” Recolor Skin
  • Gelimer “From Hell” Recolor Skin
  • Signal “The First” Recolor Skin

All of their unique equipment

To redeem this package in-game please do the following:
Instructions:
1. Purchase DLC
2. Launch client
3. Go to Hyper Shop
4. Click "Purchase Items"
5. Redeem Items

*Please note that any items already owned from this pack upon purchase will not be credited or refunded.

short_description: Who doesn’t love a good underdog story? Download this pack and beat back the odds with Curse Eye, Tooth and Tops, Gelimer, and Signal. You’ll also unlock all of their unique equipment and Tier 1 recolor skins.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese-Brazil
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7 32-bit
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core or better
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9600 or better AMD Radeon HD 4830 or better
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 650 or better AMD Radeon HD 7750 or better
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
